code: import React from"react";import QuizList from"./QuizList";import he from"he";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function(props){var quizArray=[];props.quizzes.forEach(function(quiz){var radomPos=quiz.type==="multiple"?Math.floor(Math.random()*(quiz.incorrect_answers.length+1)):Math.floor(Math.random()*2);var question=he.decode(quiz.question);var answers=quiz.incorrect_answers.map(function(answer){return he.decode(answer);});answers.splice(radomPos,0,he.decode(quiz.correct_answer));quizArray.push({correctPos:radomPos,question:question,answerList:answers});});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(QuizList,{quizList:quizArray,setQuizAgain:props.setQuizAgain});}
